summary: This bill, HR 3820, proposes to rename the women's health clinic (Red Team clinic) at the Clement J. Zablocki Veterans' Administration Medical Center in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, as the Anna Mae Robertson VA Well Woman Clinic. The bill specifies that any references to the clinic in federal documents will be updated to reflect the new name. The bill was introduced to the House of Representatives on June 6, 2025, by Ms. Moore of Wisconsin and cosponsored by several other representatives.
